block.p: The Justice Department announced it was bringing lawsuits against three Florida counties charged with violations in Election 2000 -- but did not name the counties. Democrats and civil rights groups cried foul, saying the department might be trying to dodge the most egregious claims from the torturous election. Officials in Miami-Dade, Orange and Osceola said the legal action aims at their counties and focuses on accommodations for non-native English speakers.
